mapper.select: select count(*) from nong where name = #{name}

select * from (select rownum rnum, b.* from (select nong.*, nvl(cnt,0) cnt from nong left outer join (select nong_num, count(*) cnt from NONG_CO group by nong_num) c on nong.nong_num = c.nong_num order by NONG_RE_REF desc, NONG_RE_SEQ asc) b ) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end} and name = #{name}
